title: Dante Alighieri - Inferno - 1 - Piccolo Teatro di Milano
description:
Quivi sospiri, pianti e alti guai
risonavan per l'aere sanza stelle,
per ch'io al cominciar ne lagrimai.
Diverse lingue, orribili favelle,
parole di dolore, accenti d'ira,
voci alte e fioche, e suon di man con elle
facevano un tumolto, il qual s'aggira
sempre in quell'aura sanza tempo tinta,
come la rena quando turbo spira. 

A persistent analogy applied to the Commedia is that of a crystallographic structure.  Layer upon layer of meaning continually reveals another facet of the crystal. Everything is connected to everything else (see especially the essay by Mandelstam 'Conversation about Dante')

This is a  rip from the CD-ROM that accompanies Commento alla Divina Commedia, 3 voll., Firenze, La Nuova Italia , a cura di Natalino Sapegno. Each  Canto is read  by  a member of the Piccolo Teatro di Milano.Mp3s @32kbps. I add the 2014 dramatization of the Inferno by the bbc. (easily the best audio version in English is that of Heathcote Williams on Naxos.  Try http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4431300/Dante_Alighieri_-_The_Divine_Comedy_%28another_attempt%29

(Kindly seed, and if you can't find a seed for any previous poetry torrent go to the folder 'Current Poetry Torrents' and follow the instructions on the pdf.)
